name: STALINGRAD ABATIS
description: 1942 the Great Patriotic War, the height of the battle for Stalingrad. Ivan falls asleep in a residential building, oxygen ends, unimaginable things begin to appear to him, who knows, maybe they are really happening!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows  7/8/10 Processor: Intel CORE i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 820m DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 4 GB available space Additional Notes: 64-Bit
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows  7/8/10 Processor: Intel CORE i5 Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 920mx DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space Additional Notes: 64-Bit
